snippet: The Rwandan peacekeepers aimed to halt an attack on Muslims, shooting dead a member of a crowd that had killed two people in Bangui, a spokesman said.
abstract: Rwandan peacekeepers intervene to stop attacks on Muslims in Bangui, Central African Republic, shooting and killing member of crowd that had killed two people.
lead_paragraph: The Rwandan peacekeepers aimed to halt an attack on Muslims, shooting dead a member of a crowd that had killed two people in Bangui, a spokesman said.

headline.main: Troops Halt Attack In Central Africa
headline.print_headline: Troops Halt Attack in Central Africa

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
